name: Case Opening Simulator
description:
The most advanced case opening game on Google Play ! This game includes several features and casino games to enjoy it.

This game features :
-all the collections are available to open (including cases, packages and more)
-4 casinos games (roulette, dice, crash, jackpot, minesweeper)
-market to buy items from your (in-game) wallet
-trade-up system
-rank system and experience system
-powerful skill-tree
-advanced inventory system : customizable page size and multiple item selection
-offline-based price database (to get items prices even offline!)
-discrete boost system to ease your way
-item inspector

Note: This game is only a simulation and not related to Counter Strike : Global Offensive, all skins, knives or other items found there cannot be used on Steam or official game made by Valve.
Thus, there is no relation between real and game money.
